description: Looking for a healthier make-ahead breakfast? Try this summer overnight oats recipe - just prep ahead and top with fresh fruit, yoghurt and pepitas when ready to eat.
keywords: Oats,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Quick & easy breakfast,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Raspberry,Sesame free,Stone fruit,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Mango
name: Summer Overnight Oats Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oats, buckwheat, chia seeds, milk and syrup in a bowl. Cover and chill in fridge overnight.
Divide oat mixture among bowls. Serve topped with yoghurt, fruit and pepitas.
